Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Battlefield

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Battlefield
All Implemented Interfaces:
SubjectBattlefield
public class Battlefield
extends java.lang.Object
implements SubjectBattlefield
Battlefield Class represents the board where the game is played

      Registers a worker position change
      Parameters:
      worker - subject of the action
      newColWorker - new y coordinate of the worker
      newRowWorker - new x coordinate of the worker
      oldColWorker - old y coordinate of the worker
      oldRowWorker - old x coordinate of the worker
      Throws:
      java.lang.RuntimeException

    • getWorkerView

      public Cell[][] getWorkerView​(Worker w, java.util.function.Predicate<Cell> p)
      Generates the worker's view matrix to show the space where are allowed actions (move or build)
      Parameters:
      w - subject
      p - predicate used to check if a particular movement is allowed
      Returns:
      view matrix, a Cell multidimensional array
